records.name: Plumeria Maldives

location.address: Moony Night, Kaleyfaanu Higun, Vaavu Atoll

descriptions.direction: Located in Thinadhoo, Plumeria Maldives is on the beach. Thinadhoo Harbor and Felidhoo Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Kandooma Beach and Aarah Island. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
descriptions.general: Located along the stunning white sandy beaches in Thinadhoo Island in Vaavu Atoll, with an amazing underwater world. Plumeria Maldives compromises with supreme choice of experiences. The hotel provides accommodation for grandly designed rooms with excessive standards and comforts available with all the amenities. Offering an indoor pool and a restaurant, Free WiFi access is available. Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. There is also a dining table. The private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy the sea view from the room. Extras include a minibar and a seating area. At Plumeria Maldives, you will find a private beach area. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, water sports facilities, and a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on-site or in the surroundings, including fishing, diving, and windsurfing. Speed boat twice a day from Male: Morning 10:00 Hrs / Afternoon 16:00 Hrs

records.short_description: Excellent accommodation. Good for sightseeing and has a beach nearby.
